Uses of Class
pl.lib.api.ReportBuilder

Packages that use ReportBuilder
Package
Description
pl.lib.api
API package of the library containing main classes for building reports.

  • Uses of ReportBuilder in pl.lib.api

    Methods in pl.lib.api that return ReportBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.addColumn(Column column)
    Adds a column definition to the report.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.addGroup(Group group)
    Adds a grouping definition.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.addStyle(Style style)
    Adds a style if a style with the same name is not already present.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.addSubreport(Subreport subreport)
    Registers a subreport to be rendered in the detail section.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withColorSettings(ColorSettings settings)
    Supplies color customization used by themes and bands (e.g. title background/foreground, column header colors, borders, detail colors, group header colors).
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withColumnWidth(int width)
    Explicitly sets the JasperDesign column width in pixels.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withCompanyInfo(CompanyInfo companyInfo)
    Optionally provides company info.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withFormattingOptions(FormattingOptions options)
    Sets formatting options controlling conditional highlighting, zebra striping, and bookmark generation.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withHorizontalLayout(boolean isLandscape)
    Sets page orientation.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withMargins(int top, int right, int bottom, int left)
    Sets page margins.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withPageFooter(boolean enabled)
    Enables or disables the page footer band, which contains the left text and page number.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withPageFormat(String format)
    Sets the target page format (case-insensitive) among: A4 (default), A3, LETTER, LEGAL.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withSummaryBand(boolean enabled)
    Enables or disables the summary band.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withTheme(ReportTheme theme)
    Applies a visual theme to the report by adding predefined styles.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withTitle(String title)
    Sets the report title parameter ("ReportTitle") used in the title band.
    ReportBuilder
    ReportBuilder.withTitleBand(boolean enabled)
    Enables or disables the title band.
